ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Routed_cable_component_2d_shape is a type of . A Routed_cable_component_2d_shape is the two-dimensional shape of a . The shape of the cable in the assembly may differ from the shape of the cable in the usage view only in the details of the curve set geometry. The overall path length of any curve or segment shall not be different, and the direction of the curve or segment as it relates to the connector an end of the curve or segment is geometrically related to shall not change. These constraints are supported by using Axis_placement_2d which provide both location and direction information as the items related by the junction_placement attribute.
the shape_characterized_component specifies the role of the for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape.

the junction_placement specifies the role of the for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape. There may be more than one Geometric_item_relationship for the Routed_component_2d_shape. The junction_placement specifies the set of relationships between Axis_placement_2d in the usage view shape and a correspond ing Axis_placement_2d in the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape. These relationships establish the relationships between end points of segments of the curve set that represents the cable. These relationships establish the relationships between end point directions of segments of the curve set that represents the cable. There may be more than one Geometric_item_relationship for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape. The items related by Geometric_item_relationship referenced by junction_placement shall only be Axis_placement_2d. A junction_placement must be provided for each end point of each segment in the usage view that is desired to be related to a segment end point in the design view. The junction_placement is optional and need not be provided.
Since the items related are Axis_placement_2d, there is no need for transformation matrix to transform from the source conte xt into the target context.
the connector_placement specifies the role of the for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape. There may be more than one Sub_model_placment for the Routed_component_2d_shape.
the cable_path_shape specifies the role of the for the Routed_cable_component_2d_shape. There may be more than one for the Routed_component_2d_shape.
